text: Makkal is a 1975 Indian Malayalam film, directed by K. S. Sethumadhavan and produced by M. O. Joseph. The film stars Jayabharathi, Kaviyoor Ponnamma, Adoor Bhasi and Jose Prakash in the lead roles. The film has musical score by G. Devarajan. ==Cast== *Jayabharathi *Kaviyoor Ponnamma *Adoor Bhasi *Jose Prakash *Sankaradi *Bahadoor *M. G. Soman *Mallika Sukumaran *Satheesh Sathyan ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by G.
